name: General Plumbing
description: Professional general plumbing services

name: Leak Detection
description: Professional leak detection services

name: CCTV / Water Intrusion Investigation
description: Professional CCTV / water intrusion investigation services

name: Plumbing Services
description: Professional plumbing services

name: CCTV / Water Intrusion
description: Professional CCTV and water intrusion services

name: Pre Purchase Home, Plumbing Inspection Report
description: Provides a plumbing system inspection before signing a house contract, including CCTV inspection of sewer and stormwater systems, water mains pressure testing, and review of leaking pipes.

name: Insurance Reporting for Water Intrusions
description: Experienced in insurance reporting relating to plumbing and water intrusions, using Thermal Imaging Camera technology to provide supporting images and video.

name: Real Estate Agents
description: Provides plumbing solutions to real estate property managers with fast, efficient, and honest reporting.

name: Stormwater Drainage
description: Addresses stormwater drainage issues, including agricultural pipe replacement, driveway grate installation, and downpipe redirection.

name: Blocked & Broken Drain Diagnosis
description: Uses CCTV technology to identify pipe breaks or tree roots causing blockages, and offers drain unblocking and cleaning services.

name: Burst Pipe Repair
description: Professional burst pipe repair services

name: Burst Pipes
description: MRJ Plumbers use acoustic technology to locate underground water leaks and repair or redirect the pipework.

name: Mains Water Leaks
description: MRJ Plumbing suggests checking if water is passing through your water meter if you find water surfacing on your property or received a notice from the council regarding excess usage.

name: Roof Plumbing Leaks
description: Nik can identify cracked tiles, leaking gutters, roof flashing issues and discuss solutions to stop water from entering your house.

name: Apartment Patio Leaks
description: MRJ Plumbing can identify leaks from an apartment above using infrared camera technology, then provide a detailed report with supporting images.

name: House Water Intrusion
description: MRJ Plumbing use Thermal Imaging Cameras to identify leaks in your ceiling, walls and anywhere you can't access. MRJ Plumbing can locate the problem and provide a solution.

name: Bathroom Renovations
description: Bathroom renovation services including underground pipework redirection, installing showers, basins, and tapware.

name: Kitchen Renovations
description: Kitchen renovation services, working with existing pipework or discussing solutions for plumbing redirection.

name: Laundry Renovations
description: Laundry renovation services including removal of old laundry fixtures and replacement with new.

name: Toilet Repair and Replacement
description: Toilet repair and replacement services to address leaking or dripping toilets.

name: Leaking Tap and Shower Head Repairs
description: Repair and replacement services for leaking taps and shower heads.

name: Dishwasher Plumbing and Installation
description: Dishwasher plumbing and installation services including reviewing water supply, redirecting pipework, fixing isolation taps, and installing new dishwashers.

name: Fridge Water Points and Plumbing
description: Plumbing services to redirect pipework for fridge water points.

name: Hotwater Systems
description: Hot water system services to address expiry dates, leaks, and corrosion.

name: Rainwater Tank Installation
description: Rainwater tank installation services, connecting gutters to tanks and ensuring proper storm water runoff.

name: CCTV/WATER INTRUSION
description: Professional CCTV/WATER INTRUSION services
